dmca.title: Cease And Desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tommy Smith [mailto:tcsmith3@tomcsmith.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 26, 2007 12:17 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: Cease And Desist

Thank you for your email. Please be advised of the following  
information about copyright infringement regarding one of the sites  
you host.

1. This is a written communication to Andrea Z. Almeida, the Agent  
you have designated to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement.

2. The copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed is an article  
appearing at http://buzzdroid.com/apple/when-your-macbook-wont- 
start/ , titled "When Your MacBook Won't Start" Published on March  
17, 2007 and authored by Tommy Smith.

3. The site you are hosting that infringes on the above copyrighted  
work can be found at http://buzzdroid.com/apple/when-your-macbook- 
wont-start/ . On that page, Item 37 is an exact reproduction of the  
original article without permission from the author. Attached you  
will find a screenshot of the page.
I am both the copyright holder and I did not give permission or  
authorize use of this material in this matter. You may contact me at  
the information below:

Tommy C. Smith, III
Attorney and Counselor At Law
1600 Virginia Beach Blvd.
Virginia Beach, VA 23454
(757)428-3481
(757)491-6174 Fax

email: tcsmith3@tomcsmith.com


On Mar 26, 2007, at 11:31 AM, Copyright wrote:

> To Whom It May Concern:

>

> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice  

> does not

> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the

> Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

>

> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your

> claim.

>

> Please visit our web site at

> www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright% 

> 20Infringeme

> nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

>

> Legal Response Team

> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

>

> -----Original Message-----

> From: Tommy Smith [mailto:tcsmith3@tomcsmith.com]

> Sent: Sunday, March 25, 2007 11:56 AM

> To: Technical Support; Copyright

> Subject: Cease And Desist

>

> Please be advised you are hosting an account that has been regularly

> infringing on the copyrights of my client, Buzz Droid Media.

>

> The offending domain names are listed as follows:

>

> satellitecableguide.info

> polaroidcameratalk.info

> notebookwirelessguide.info

> usbcameracenter.info

> steamcleaningguide.info

>

> The offending IP Address is 70.87.225.242.

>

> Please advise me immediately as to what steps you are taking to

> remove the offending sites now that you have been properly notified

> of the violation.

>

> Sincerely,

>

> Tommy C. Smith, III

> Attorney at Law

> 1600 Virginia Beach Blvd.

> Virginia Beach, VA 23454

> (757)428-3481

> (757)491-6174 Fax

>

> http://tomcsmith.com
dmca.principal_name: Tommy C. Smith, III (For Buzz Droid Media)
